RelatedSentence: In the interest of not saying something stupid , I never try to figure it out .

A1: the interest of not saying something stupid
RelatedSentence: In the interest of not saying something stupid , I never try to figure it out .
My wife said to treat Monday like just another day .
Every birthday means something to a woman , especially if she 's within 100 yards of a scale or a mirror .
General female birthday statement : I ca n't believe that I 'm 29 now .
General male birthday statement : I ca n't believe I ate an entire cake .
General male birthday statement : I ca n't believe I ate an entire cake .
My wife is able to see things in her face that I do n't see because I 'm a guy and automatically no more observant or feeling than a stump .
I bought her something expensive .
I even vacuumed a little .
Me : Have n't you always had that ?
I survived the incident somehow and have been more considerate since .
Even relative simpletons have a survival instinct .
The truth is that I 've always considered my wife beautiful .
But I have a Y chromosome and therefore ca n't be entirely believed when assessing a woman 's looks .
The effect birthdays have on a person depends largely on individual personalities .
The effect birthdays have on a person depends largely on individual personalities .
Some of my friends despaired at turning the Big 50 .
They received condolence cards , bouquets of black balloons and pitying remarks .
For me , 50 felt like 24 hours older than 49 years and 364 days .
I 've only ever paid attention to four birthdays .
They meant something because each of them represented a major milestone in my life .
They meant something because each of them represented a major milestone in my life .
I had already passed drivers ed .
Nobody could stop me - except for my parents , the police and court .
Eighteen meant I was entitled to help direct America 's future .
I did n't care about that .
I immediately got a letter that said so .
I immediately got a letter that said so .
I looked forward to turning 21 .
It meant that I was old enough to legally get drunk .
Thanks to the Army , I already had a lot of practice .
